mapper.insert: insert into experiment_running (id, fk_user_id,running_status, fk_experiment_id, is_deleted, start_time, end_time, run_id) values (#{id},#{fkUserId}, #{runningStatus}, #{fkExperimentId}, #{isDeleted}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{runId})
mapper.select: select experiment_running.id as id, experiment_running.fk_user_id as fkUserId, experiment_running.running_status as runningStatus, experiment_running.fk_experiment_id as fkExperimentId, experiment_running.fk_model_id as fkModelId, experiment_running.is_deleted as isDeleted, experiment_running.start_time as startTime, experiment_running.end_time as endTime, experiment_running.run_id as runId, experiment_running.fk_dl_result_table_name as fkDlResultTableName, experiment_running.conversation_id as conversationId from experiment_running where experiment_running.fk_experiment_id = #{experimentId} order by id desc

select experiment_running.id as id, experiment_running.fk_user_id as fkUserId, experiment_running.running_status as runningStatus, experiment_running.fk_experiment_id as fkExperimentId, experiment_running.fk_model_id as fkModelId, experiment_running.is_deleted as isDeleted, experiment_running.start_time as startTime, experiment_running.end_time as endTime, experiment_running.run_id as runId, experiment_running.fk_dl_result_table_name as fkDlResultTableName, experiment_running.conversation_id as conversationId from experiment_running where experiment_running.id = #{runningId} order by id desc

select experiment_running.id as id, experiment_running.fk_user_id as fkUserId, experiment_running.running_status as runningStatus, experiment_running.fk_experiment_id as fkExperimentId, experiment_running.fk_model_id as fkModelId, experiment_running.is_deleted as isDeleted, experiment_running.start_time as startTime, experiment_running.end_time as endTime, experiment_running.run_id as runId, experiment_running.fk_dl_result_table_name as fkDlResultTableName, experiment_running.conversation_id as conversationId from experiment_running where experiment_running.fk_experiment_id = #{experimentId} and experiment_running.is_deleted = #{isDeleted} order by id desc

select experiment_running.id as id, experiment_running.fk_user_id as fkUserId, experiment_running.running_status as runningStatus, experiment_running.fk_experiment_id as fkExperimentId, experiment_running.fk_model_id as fkModelId, experiment_running.is_deleted as isDeleted, experiment_running.start_time as startTime, experiment_running.end_time as endTime, experiment_running.run_id as runId, experiment_running.fk_dl_result_table_name as fkDlResultTableName, experiment_running.conversation_id as conversationId from experiment_running where experiment_running.fk_user_id=#{userId} and experiment_running.is_deleted = #{isDeleted} order by id desc

select experiment_running.id as id, experiment_running.fk_user_id as fkUserId, experiment_running.running_status as runningStatus, experiment_running.fk_experiment_id as fkExperimentId, experiment_running.fk_model_id as fkModelId, experiment_running.is_deleted as isDeleted, experiment_running.start_time as startTime, experiment_running.end_time as endTime, experiment_running.run_id as runId, experiment_running.fk_dl_result_table_name as fkDlResultTableName, experiment_running.conversation_id as conversationId from experiment_running where experiment_running.fk_user_id = #{userId} order by experiment_running.start_time desc limit #{experimentRunningNum}
